name: Nikwax TX.Direct Waterproofer Spray 300ml
description: This spray-on treatment restores the durable water repellency finish of all waterproof-breathable laminates and coatings. It's ideal for garments with knitted wicking linings or gear such as single wall tents and bivy sacks that cannot be machine washed. Pre-wash your item with Nikwax Tech Wash or another mild soap before treating it.Safe for GORE-TEX®, Entrant®, most other waterproof-breathables, and other woven fabrics.Non-aerosol, non-flammable contents.300ml bottle treats one garment plus accessories.
